ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well at least you made it very clear what you think about that place... but I personally liked that place since you had the constant fear for Borxx all the
ygData.messageBody:
--- From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>RunnyEye SUCKS!!! Avoid it at all costs! Seriously, RunnyEye can be fun, but
>I have died WAY too many times from Borxx (Evil Eye) so I avoid that place
>like the plague. To me, I can do without any of the blackened items.
>RunnyEye is good for level 7 and up, although it is really better suited for
>levels 15 to 20 or so.

Well at least you made it very clear what you think about that place... but
I personally liked that place since you had the constant fear for Borxx all the
time and we had some very close runs away from her. Once i had only 1 HP
left after zoning from Runnyeye... that inspired me to write a story to EQVault
titled 'Borxx got me... NOT!' and had some great responses to that story. I
will certainly go back to Runnyeye just to finally see her slayed down when
I am done with Mistmoore... though it will probably take a few levels before
I will leave Faydwer again. I myself didn't die too many times there, and at
that time i didn't really care about it. I got past level 20 in there and i think i
leveled 4 or 5 times fighting in there. At 22 i went back to Faydwer.

Iyenya Goldenheart
Lvl 24 dwarf cleric
Innoruuk server
